Name: Churchill Martini
Ingredients: 75 ml Hayman's London Dry Gin from freezer
Instructions: STIR gin with ice while glancing at an unopened bottle of dry vermouth. Strain into chilled glass.
Review: Gin served chilled and neat, other than with a little dilution courtesy of melting ice. A great man but not necessarily a great cocktail!
History: Legend has it that Sir Winston Churchill liked his Martinis served without the vermouth actually being added to the drink, just present in the same room. He is quoted as saying, "Glance at the vermouth bottle briefly while pouring the juniper distillate freely." See History and evolution of the Martini cocktail .
